pages.text: City centers are large buildings that determine the type of Rider mobs that spawn in a city. They also determine whether the city will be an urban or suburban area.

pages.title: Fuuto Tower
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider W (2009, TV show)$(br2)Mobs:$(li)$(l:w/mobs/masquerade)Masquerade$(/l)$(br2)Cityscape: Urban$(br2)Loot: None

pages.title: Sabbath Grounds
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Wizard (2012, TV show)$(br2)Mobs:$(li)$(l:wizard/mobs/ghouls)Ghouls$(/l)$(br2)Cityscape: Urban

$(li)1 $(l:gaim/items/lockseeds#proto_donguri_lockseed)Proto Donguri Lockseed$(/l) (13.2%)$(li)1 $(l:gaim/items/lockseeds#proto_durian_lockseed)Proto Durian Lockseed$(/l) (13.2%)$(br2)Other loot:$(li)18 $(l:misc/items/foods#vienna_coffee)Vienna Coffee$(/l) (in a row of barrels on the third floor)$(li)3 $(l:misc/items/foods#helheim_fruit)Helheim Fruits$(/l) (on the desks in the sixth floor lab area)$(li)1 $(l:gaim/items/energy_lockseeds#proto_dragon_fruits_energy_lockseed)Proto Dragon Fruits Energy Lockseed$(/l) (on a table in Ryoma's office)

pages.title: Pandora Tower
